CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It can be observed that the open circuit voltages of cells fabricated using PFDTBT and its ter-polymers range from 0.70 to 0.77 V. The device fabricated using PFDTBT showed higher open circuit voltages than those of perylene-containing copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT and its ter-polymers |
| PFDTBT |
| Perylene-containing copolymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT and its ter-polymers |
| PFDTBT |
| Perylene-containing copolymers |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "PFDTBT and its ter-polymers" and "PFDTBT" as the materials used for fabricating the cells and "perylene-containing copolymers" as a comparison. Therefore, these are the material names that should be identified.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It can be observed that the open circuit voltages of cells fabricated using PFDTBT and its ter-polymers range from 0.70 to 0.77 V. The device fabricated using PFDTBT showed higher open circuit voltages than those of perylene-containing copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltages |
| of cells fabricated using PFDTBT |
| of cells fabricated using its ter-polymers |
| of the device fabricated using PFDTBT |
| of devices fabricated using perylene-containing copolymers |
| range from |
| from 0.70 to 0.77 V |
| higher |
| showed higher open circuit voltages than |
| those of perylene-containing copolers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open circuit voltages of cells fabricated using PFDTBT |
| open circuit voltages of cells fabricated using its ter-polymers |
| open circuit voltage of the device fabricated using PFDTBT |
| open circuit voltages of devices fabricated using perylene-containing copolymers |
| range from |
| from 0.70 to 0.77 V |
| higher |
| showed higher open circuit voltages than |
| those of perylene-containing copolymers |

Note: In this case, "higher" and "those" do not clearly refer to material properties, but rather describe the relationship between the properties of different materials. However, since the original paragraph focuses on comparing the open circuit voltages of different materials, it is included for context. If the focus of the analysis changes, "higher" and "those" may need to be removed as they do not directly refer to material properties.
